name: Super-Scuffed Car Game Thing
description:
A very scuffed multiplayer game where your objective is to knock other players off of the edge of the map. 

To host your own game, hit the "Host" button in the top left of the menu.

To connect locally enter IP: 127.0.0.1

To connect to your friends online you must use your IPv4 address. Find it here.

WARNING: You MUST forward UCP/TDP Ports 7777 for online play to function properly.

Have fun!
